sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Document, Page, Text, View, StyleSheet } from '@react-pdf/renderer';

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  page: {
    flexDirection: 'column',
    backgroundColor: '#E4E4E4',
    padding: 30,
  },
  section: {
    margin: 10,
    padding: 10,
    flexGrow: 1,
  },
  title: {
    fontSize: 24,
    marginBottom: 10,
  },
  subtitle: {
    fontSize: 18,
    marginBottom: 10,
  },
  text: {
    fontSize: 12,
    marginBottom: 5,
  },
  table: { 
    display: "table", 
    width: "auto", 
    borderStyle: "solid", 
    borderWidth: 1, 
    borderRightWidth: 0, 
    borderBottomWidth: 0 
  },
  tableRow: { 
    margin: "auto", 
    flexDirection: "row" 
  },
  tableCol: { 
    width: "25%", 
    borderStyle: "solid", 
    borderWidth: 1, 
    borderLeftWidth: 0, 
    borderTopWidth: 0 
  },
  tableCell: { 
    margin: "auto", 
    marginTop: 5, 
    fontSize: 10 
  }
});

const OrderPDF = ({ lineItems, totalGarmentQuantity, totalCapQuantity, totalPrice }) => (
  <Document>
    <Page size="A4" style={styles.page}>
      <View style={styles.section}>
        <Text style={styles.title}>Embroidery Order</Text>
        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>Order Summary</Text>
        <Text style={styles.text}>Total Garment Quantity: {totalGarmentQuantity}</Text>
        <Text style={styles.text}>Total Cap Quantity: {totalCapQuantity}</Text>
        <Text style={styles.text}>Total Price: ${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}</Text>
      </View>
      <View style={styles.section}>
        <Text style={styles.subtitle}>Order Details</Text>
        <View style={styles.table}>
          <View style={styles.tableRow}>
            <View style={styles.tableCol}>
              <Text style={styles.tableCell}>Style</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.tableCol}>
              <Text style={styles.tableCell}>Color</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.tableCol}>
              <Text style={styles.tableCell}>Quantity</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.tableCol}>
              <Text style={styles.tableCell}>Subtotal</Text>
            </View>
          </View>
          {lineItems.map((item, index) => (
            <View style={styles.tableRow} key={index}>
              <View style={styles.tableCol}>
                <Text style={styles.tableCell}>{item.styleNo}</Text>
              </View>
              <View style={styles.tableCol}>
                <Text style={styles.tableCell}>{item.colorName}</Text>
              </View>
              <View style={styles.tableCol}>
                <Text style={styles.tableCell}>{item.totalQuantity}</Text>
              </View>
              <View style={styles.tableCol}>
                <Text style={styles.tableCell}>${item.subtotal.toFixed(2)}</Text>
              </View>
            </View>
          ))}
        </View>
      </View>
    </Page>
  </Document>
);

export default OrderPDF;
